Frequently asked questions

It depends on your goals. The Basic and Starter plans are ideal for individual creators who need simple, fast video creation. Pro is best for small businesses that require advanced branding, premium media, and more customization. The Team plan is built for organizations that need custom templates, collaboration features, workflow controls, translations, SSO, and enterprise grade support.
The Team plan includes everything in Pro plus enterprise capabilities such as custom branded templates, bespoke scene designs, workspace and user management, translation tools, SSO, approval workflows, DAM integrations, and a dedicated customer success manager. It is designed for companies scaling video creation across multiple teams or locations.
Yes. Starter and Pro include brand kits, custom colors, and font uploads. The Team plan adds bespoke branded templates, custom transitions, and support from the Lumen5 Creative Services team so every exported video stays aligned with your brand identity across teams and regions.
All paid plans include AI Script Composer, AI Voiceover, and high quality AI media. The Basic plan includes standard AI features, while Starter and Pro offer expanded AI capabilities and longer AI voiceover limits. The Team plan introduces advanced capabilities like translations and custom AI Voice options.
Translation credits allow you to create localized versions of your videos. Pro users receive sixty translations per year, while Team customers receive unlimited translations. This is especially helpful for global marketing, internal communications, and learning and development teams that need multi language content.
Yes. All videos you create are yours to keep permanently. You can download and reuse them even if you cancel your plan. You will only lose access to premium features associated with higher tier subscriptions.
